data.eml:eml: A new species of Mongolodiaptomus Kiefer, 1938 from northeast Thailand and a key to the species (Crustacea, Copepoda, Calanoida, Diaptomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Watiroyram, Santi, Sanoamuang, La-orsri (2017): A new species of Mongolodiaptomus Kiefer, 1938 from northeast Thailand and a key to the species (Crustacea, Copepoda, Calanoida, Diaptomidae). ZooKeys 710: 15-32, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.710.13941, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.710.13941
